entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unexpected errors are reported around synthesized tuple error fields #56327
  • Move XamlOptions back to Microsoft.VisualStudio.LanguageServices.Xaml #56324
    Backlog
  • Test plan for "using aliases for any types" #56323
    Compiler.Next
  • Ambigious call in PLinq Aggregate method due to C#10 lambda type inference #56319
    17.0
  • clicking on a specific error (CS5001) fails to reach the on-line search - #56318
    Backlog
  • IDE0060 (unused param) with NotImplementedException #56317
    Backlog
  • Navigating between lines in "Find References" result changes focus in an unexpected way #56313
    17.0

Closed

  • null reference in RemoveUnusedValuesCodeFixProvider #56304

PullRequests

Created

  • Factor process telemetry service out of RemoteHostService #56329
    Area-IDE
  • Update EnC-Supported-Edits.md #56328
    Area-Compilers
  • WIP: Support find refs on global aliases. #56326
    Area-IDE
  • Initial implementation of event hookup in object initializers. #56322
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix equals operator with split state on right #56321
    Area-Compilers
  • StackTrace Explorer Implementation #56315
    Area-IDE
  • Create misc files workspace for LSP #56314
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to release/dev17.1-preview1 #56311
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Workaround for XamlOptions loading regression #56325
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56309
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Move semantic classification caching down to Editor layer #56310
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Expose ServiceHub Core remote options to UnitTesing #56320
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Fix typo: Verson → Version #56115
    Next
  • Move VS lsp client implementation to EditorFeatures for VSMac #56051
    Area-IDE
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56312
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56332
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56331
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56330
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Filter the directive trivia when code generation service try to reuse the syntax #56222
    Area-IDE
  • Control exposure of tuple fields #56293
    Area-Compilers
  • Use 1ES build pools #56186
    Area-Infrastructure
  • List patterns: subsumption checking #53891
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - List Patterns, 17.0
  • Prototype of how to potentially add `using alias = type` to the language. #50167
    Area-Compilers
  • Add documents to PDB for types that have no methods with IL #56278
    Area-Compilers
  • Read StorageOptions from solution snapshot. #56307
    Area-IDE
  • Use SpillSequences when appropriate instead of Sequences #56153
    Area-Compilers
  • Incremental Generator Work Tracking API Implementation #55469
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Source Generators, 17.0
  • Apply arcade-powered source-build patches #55823
    Area-Infrastructure, Source-Build
  • Dispose per-instance services created by factories #47951
    Area-IDE
  • Completion: Suggest "await" after dot of awaitable expression #55817
    Area-IDE, Feature Request, Community
